org.jivesoftware.smack.filter

Class PacketTypeFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jivesoftware.smack.filter.PacketTypeFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StanzaFilter
    Deprecated. 
    use StanzaTypeFilter instead.

    @Deprecated
public class PacketTypeFilter
extends Object
implements StanzaFilter
    Filters for packets of a particular type. The type is given as a Class object, so example types would:
    • Message.class
    • IQ.class
    • Presence.class

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PacketTypeFilter(Class<? extends Stanza> packetType)
      Deprecated. 
      Creates a new stanza(/packet) type filter that will filter for packets that are the same type as packetType.
